creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: Two panel huipil with slit neck opening and randa extending 1/2 way down front; white ground cloth with patterning primarily in red with pink, green, black, blue, orange and yellow; design consists of stylized bird and tree patterns, diamonds and other geometric motifs.
medium: Cotton, silk; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
